entry.title: Mordern Neurobiology
entry.content:
现代神经生物学 Advanced Neurobiology

1 Electrical signals in neurons

  • Galvani frog legs experiment

  • 恒流源+电容：电压一直上升

    • $$
      I=C\frac{dV}{dt}\implies \frac{dV}{dt}=I/C>0
      $$

  • 水分子的电子云分布——以水合离子的形式在溶液中运动，是极性分子

Ion Movement

  • diffusion: Ficks law
    $$
    J_{dif}=-D\frac{\partial [C]}{\partial x}
    $$

    • $D$ 扩散系数，直径小～$D$ 大
    • $[C]$ ion concentration

  • electrical drift: Ohm’s law
    $$
    J_{drift}=-\mu z[C]\frac{\partial V}{\partial x},\
    I=\frac{1}{\rho}\frac{\Delta V}{L}A
    $$

    • $J_{drift}$ drift flux [$molecules/cm^2\cdot s$]
    • $\mu$ mobility [$cm^2/(V\cdot s)$]
    • $\partial V/\partial x\sim E$
    • $\rho$ 电阻率，细胞内外液 $\sim 60\ \Omega\cdot m $

Equilibrium potential

  • 电化学平衡：扩散与电迁移达到平衡

  • 离子主要分布在膜上？且很少量？

    • 原因：膜薄，正负电荷吸引；膜厚–>电场变弱，需要更多的离子积聚 （$E=\Delta V/l$）
    • 细胞膜厚度～23 埃
    • 膜是电容

  • 平衡电位：能斯特电位
    $$
    \Delta V=\frac{kT}{q}\ln\left(\frac{\varphi_{out}}{\varphi_{in}}\right)
    $$

    • 推导: 利用玻尔兹曼方程（热平衡状态下～没有热交换）
      $$
      \frac{p(U_1)}{p(U_2)}=\exp{\left(-\frac{U_1-U_2}{kT}\right)}\
      \implies \frac{p(in)}{p(out)}=\exp\left({-\frac{q(V_{in}-V_{out})}{kT}}\right)\
      \implies \Delta V=V_{in}-V_{out}=\frac{kT}{q}\ln\left(\frac{p(in)}{p(out)}\right)\sim\frac{kT}{q}\ln\left(\frac{[C_{in}]}{[C_{out}]}\right)
      $$

Ion gradient maintenance

Electrogenic pumps. 生电泵：出去的阳离子多，电位更负

  • Na/K-ATPase pump
  • Ca-ATPase pump
  • Na-Ca cotransporter
  • K-Cl cotransporter

Movement of ions across biological membrane

  • 认为膜上也有离子浓度，有个分配系数 $\beta$: $\beta\ [C_{in}],\beta<1$

  • 膜内扩散系数：$D^*$

  • 离子通透性
    $$
    P=\frac{D^*\cdot\beta}{l}
    $$

  • Goldman-Hodgkin-Katz (GHK) equation
    $$

    $$

    $$

$$
C\frac{dV}{dt}=g_L(E_L-V)+\bar g_Kn^4(E_K-V)+\bar g_{Na}m^3h(E_{Na}-V)+I_{app}

Glutamate Receptor

阳离子通道，兴奋性受体，开放后介导膜的去极化

Glutamate

  • The major excitatory neurotransmitter in the mammalian CNS, acting through both ligand-gated ion channels (ionotropic 离子型受体) and G-protein-coupled receptors (metabotropic 代谢型受体).
  • Glutamate is stored in synaptic vesicles and released by Ca2+ dependent exocytosis.
  • 谷氨酸代谢
    • 合成：谷氨酰胺+谷氨酸合成酶
    • 与GABA可以相互转化

1. AMPA receptor

AMPA和NMDA之间的主要区别在于，AMPA受体中仅发生钠和钾的流入 (注: 不绝对，exists Ca permeable AMPA receptors)，而NMDA受体中，除了钠和钾的流入以外，还发生钙的流入。 此外，AMPA受体在核心中不包含镁离子块，而NMDA在核心中包含镁离子块。

  • Non-NMDA-type

  • 配体是谷氨酸，结合点在胞外

  • 四聚体：以来四个亚基，和细胞膜上的一些辅助亚基有互作

  • 三次半跨膜

  • Q/R剪切：决定能否透 Ca

  • 胞内有很多调控和修饰位点

  • LTP的产生：长时间增强（突触可塑性）

    • 依赖于AMPA受体
    • Glutamates bind to AMPAs and NMDARs, causing AMPAs to open and Na+ flows into the postsynaptic cell, resulting to a depolarization

  • AMPA trafficking pathway

  • AMPA interacting protein

    • NSF: 促进膜融合（上膜）

  • AMPA pharmacology

    • agonists 激动剂
    • antagonists 拮抗剂

2. NMDA receptor

NMDA受体的结合，会导致离子通道非选择性地开启，使阳离子通过，进而使平衡电位改变至接近0mV。NMDA受体进行活化，必须依赖电压，这会导致离子通道会阻挡细胞外的Mg2+与Zn2+离子通过，并允许Na+离子与少量Ca2+离子流入细胞，以及使K +离子流出细胞，并保持电压的依赖性。功能性的NMDA受体必须含有NR1亚单位，多个NR2亚单位与NR1共同形成四聚体或五聚体。NR1是构成离子通道的基本亚单位；NR2是调节亚单位，不同NR2组成的NMDA受体表现出不同的脑内分布与生理学特性。

  • NMDA: N-methyl-D-aspartate N-甲基-D-天冬氨酸

  • 只有异聚体 (hetero-oligometric protein) 没有同聚体

  • Has critical rule in Ca flux

  • Subunits

    • NR1: 3个外显子，可形成8个剪切变体

    • NR2：

    • 在发育过程中的数量不同

      • GluN2A和GluN2B在发育过程中的switch

    • 脱敏时间不同

    • 开放概率不同

  • Distinction :

    • 需要两个激动剂激活—glutamate and glycine
    • 开放后被 Mg离子 block，得等膜电位去极化到-40mv左右，才能把Mg离子赶出去
      • 和AMPA联动

  • Topology

    • $\varepsilon$ — learning rate, 描述突触可塑性程度

  • LTP in hippocampus

    • early/late phase LTP

  • LTP is pathway specific 专一性

  • associativity of synaptic LTP

    • 2个弱刺激点联合刺激，可能激发单个强刺激所无法激活的LTP

  • reduced failures after LTP

  • 激活失败的概率降低，大电流下降，效率提高

  • induction of LTP

    • silent synapse model：AMPA and NMDA
    • 大量Ca的进入是激活LTP的初始条件–>NMDA的开放很重要

  • Post-synaptic active CaMKII causes an LTP-like effect

  • LTP and behavior

    • 水迷宫与空间记忆 Morris maze

  • Short-term plasticity

Long-term Depression (LTD)

  • various forms of LTD
    • homosynaptic
    • heterosynaptic
    • associative LTD
    • cerebellar LTD

Learning and Memory

  • Cell assembly
  • H.M. 病人：海马是新记忆产生的起点
  • 海马和空间记忆

8 Brain Circuit and Brain Disorders

History

  • Localization of function in the brain
    • Broca area
  • Golgi: staining, 网状学说
  • Cajal: neuron doctrine 神经元学说

Neural Circuit

  • What is neural circuit?
  • Examples of neural circuit
  • Two classes of neurons in neocortex: glutamatergic and GABAergic
    • interneuron diversity
    • three non-overlapping GABAergic interneuron
      • PA,sSA,

Construction

  • Feedforward inhibition (FFI, 前馈抑制神经环路)

    • 兴奋性传入，一段时间后抑制性传入主神经元–> narraw time-window

  • Feedback inhibition (FBI)

    • 兴奋性传入， 抑制周边兴奋性神经元（侧抑制）

  • Disinhibitory: 兴奋性传入，抑制下游抑制性神经元

    • Disinhibitory microcircuit

  • 行为学范式：auditory fear conditioning

Neural disorders

pass～

Questions

  • how is the inside-out patch used in the in-vitro experiment?

  • Prepulse?

  • 有没有被验证？

  • 电流钳和电压得到的电流曲线是相反的？

  • Glu –> Astrocyte 耗能？

    • 让星胶去耗能

  • what is the floor plate in spinal cord?

  • 什么是受体的同/异聚体？为什么NMDA只有异聚体？

    • Oligomeric proteins may be composed either exclusively of several copies of identical polypeptide chains, in which case they are termed homo-oligomers, or alternatively by at least one copy of different polypeptide chains (hetero-oligomers).

  • 什么是IPSC电流？

  • What is cAMP?

  • VIP neurons, PV neurons

idea

entry.title: Molecular Medicine Notes
entry.content:
分子医学 I （分子生物学）

研究逻辑：gain of function, loss of function

关键关联学科：生物信息学, 细胞生物学

  • 研究技术
  • 里程碑
    • 基因工程技术的建立：限制性核酸内切酶，聚合酶链式反应(PCR), DNA重组技术
    • 人类基因组计划 (Human Genome Project, HGP): 基因测序

0 DNA, RNA, Protein

rRNA–>ribosome

mRNA: 3’–AAAA (poly-A), 5’–cap 5’端是指有裸露的磷酸根的那一端（上游，认为是核苷酸的头），3’是指有裸露的羟基的那一端。3’5’是五碳糖的碳位

Transfer ribonucleic acids, tRNA–>amino acids: tRNAs function at specific sites in the ribosome during translation, which is a process that synthesizes a protein from an mRNA molecule.

Small nuclear RNAs, snRNAs: are critical components of the spliceosome that catalyze the splicing of pre-mRNA.

Central Dogma

中心法则 (the central dogma of molecular biology) : DNA制造RNA，RNA制造蛋白质，蛋白质反过来协助前两项流程，并协助DNA自我复制：

  • DNA–>replication–>DNA 真核/原核的环状DNA复制过程

  • RNA–>replication–>RNA

  • DNA–>transcription–>RNA–>Protein

  • RNA–>reverse-transcription–>DNA

    Promoter （启动子）, 外显子 exon ，内含子 intron（被剪切splicing掉），UTR–非翻译区

Plasmid

Transformation（转化）： plasmid placed in bacteria

Transfection（转染）: plasmid placed in eukaryotic, transient, and stable

  • How to read the information label on a plasmid?

​ $Amp^r$–抗青霉素：用于筛选

  • Components of the plasmid

    P_CMV–启动子, ATG–起始密码子, His-tag, MCS–多克隆位点

1 DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid)

1.1 History

Read this: https://www.nature.com/scitable/topicpage/discovery-of-dna-structure-and-function-watson-397/

  • DNA as the genetic material

    • 肺炎双球菌转化实验

    • Hershey-Chase Experiment：同位素标记实验

  • DNA is a polymer of nucleotides

    • Structural Model

    • Maurice Wilkins and Rosalind Franklin were using X-ray crystallography to study molecular structure

    • DNA: the double helix model

      • 直径2nm的双螺旋

1.2 Replication

See this: pku-molecular_biology-03

Watch the movie of the DNA replication !

  • RNA Primer

  • Direction: 5’–>3’

  • Semi-conservative, semi-discontinuous

  • Base paring to a templatee strand

  • Okazaki fragments: 滞后链中不连续合成的较短DNA片段

  • Procedure

  • DNA聚合酶、DNA连接酶等

1.3 Repair

Read this: 2015诺贝尔化学奖为什么授予DNA修复机制的研究

  • Mutation
    • Causes: exogenous, endogenous
  • Single strand break
    • Nucleotidee excision repair
    • Base excision repair
    • Mismatch repair
  • Double strand break
    • Nonhomologous end joining
    • homologous recombination 同源重组

1.4 Transcription

Procedure

  1. Initiation

    • start point: TATA box
    • transcription factors: TFIID, TFIIB (具有核酸结合能力的特殊蛋白质)
    • transcription initiation complex: 转录起始复合物
    • 研究方法：荧光报告基因，二代测序

  2. Elongation

    • RNA polymerase II: untwists the double helix. Transcribed simultaneously by several polymerases.
    • Nucleotides are added to the 3’ end of the growing RNA molecule
      • DNA转录的方向性: 3’–>5’
    • Speed: 40 nucleotides/s in eukaryotes
    • The new RNA molecule peels away from its DNA template
    • The DNA double helix reforms.

  3. Termination

    • Different in bacteria and eukaryotes

      • Bacteria: polymerase stops transcription at the terminator, and the mRNA can be translated without further modification;
      • Eukaryotes: RNA polymerase II transcribes the polyadenylation signal sequence, and the transcription is released 10–35 nucleotides past the signal sequence.

    • Eukaryote: pre-mRNA molecule. The 5’ end receives a modified nucleotide cap; the 3’ end gets a poly-A tail.

      • Function: 3’ UTR region facilitates the export of mNRA to the cytoplasm; 3’ poly-A protects mRNA from hydrolytic enzymes; 5’ cap help ribosomes attach to the 5’ end.

  4. (Post) RNA splicing: removes introns (non-coding) and joins exons, creating an mRNA molecule with a continuous coding sequence

    • alternative splicing 可变性剪切: exon skipping, intron retention ,alternative 5’ splice site, alternative 3’ splice site, mutually exclusive exons

Transcription Regulators (转录因子)

  • Cis-regulatory sequence: enhancer (增强子) – 招募中介蛋白，增强启动子处的基因表达
  • Insulator (隔离子)
  • 抑制子

2 Gene Control

  • gene expression determines the cell identity

    • 植物细胞：全能性
    • 动物细胞：体细胞核移植技术；体细胞重编程技术 (Shinya Yamanaka 山中伸弥, Nobel prize 2012)

  • In response tot environmental changes

  • Different control levels:

    • Chromatin modificaiton
      • histone acetylation (乙酰化): enhancing transcription
      • DNA methylation (甲基化): reducing transcription
    • Transcription
      • regulators
      • post-transcription: RNA splicing
      • Small noncoding RNA: regulate many animal and plant genes through RNA interference
        • miRNA: micro RNA, 和RNA结合可部分配对
        • siRNA: small interference RNA, 和RNA需完全配对
        • piRNA
      • Long noncoding RNA (>200 base pair)
    • Translation
      • Initiation
      • processing
      • degradation

3 Protein

3.1 Generation

  • Life Cycle

    • 翻译–>成熟–>修饰（快速改变功能。如磷酸化，添加了磷酸基团）–>执行功能–>降解

  • Translation [Reading: https://rsscience.com/ribosomes/]

    • Protein synthesizing machinery:

      • Template: mRNA
      • Ingredients: amino acids (20 types)
      • Carrier: tRNA

    • Genetic code

      • U,C,A,G
      • Start codon: AUG—methionine (蛋氨酸); stop codon—UGA, UAA, UAG
      • Degeneracy: 61 triplets code for 20 amino acids
      • Triplet genetic code: Universal
      • [Further reading] 三联子的鉴定，为什么都是三联子编码

    • tRNA (transfer RNA)

      • Contains 60–95 nt (nucleotide), commonly 76

      • It acts as an adapter molecule for linking amino acids to its specific codon in the mRNA template.

      • Diagram of the tRNA

      • Wobbling: 不完全遵循碱基互补配对

    • Ribosome: rRNAs and r-proteins，复杂的蛋白质复合体

      • Components: S—沉降系数，离心区分

      • Generation: ribosome components are transcribed by Pol I, Pol II, and Pol III： 不同RNA聚合酶 (Pol) 的功能和对应产物

        • The synthesis of mRNA is a complex process in eukaryotes. Compared to prokaryotes, where only a single polymerase is required to bind with the DNA strands, eukaryotes require three different polymerases, along with an additional set of transcriptional factors (TFs) for transcription and translation. The three polymerases required are RNA polymerase I, II, and III.

      • Structure: 2009 Nobel Prize. Several active centers: mRNA binding, E site, P site, G factor site, 5S site, polypeptide exit site

        • Ribosomes appear flattened and spherical when viewed under an electron microscope, with a diameter ranging between 15 to 25 nm.

        • These structures are comprised of two major ribonucleoprotein subunits. The two subunits assemble to translate mRNA and disassemble when translation is complete.

        • The simplest ribosome is from bacteria and comprises the 30S and 50S subunit, forming the 70S ribosome. In contrast, yeast ribosomes contain the 40S and 60S subunits, which assemble to form the 80S structure.

        • Each subunit across species contains three sites that underpin the translation process. These are designated the A (aminoacyl), which accommodates the incoming tRNA which is primed with an amino acid (aminoacylated-tRNA); P (peptidyl), which holds the tRNA with the emerging, or nascent, peptide chain (peptidyl-tRNA); and E (exit), which mobilizes the emerging tRNA which has been stripped of its amino acid (deacylated-tRNA).

      • Distribution

  • Synthesis Precudure

    • Initiation :

      • Rate–limit–step

      • Procedure:

        1. 小亚基结合mRNA

        2. start codon识别

        3. 大亚基与小亚基结合

        4. Met-tRNA go into P-site

      • Bacteria: before AUG, there is an SD-sequence

      • Eukaryotic: before AUG, there is a Kozak consensus sequence. Cap-dependent initiation, 小亚基先结合到cap 结构上。 elF4F.

    • Elongation: 往前走3个，加到tRNA带着的3个氨基酸上

      • 耗能，需要GTP
      • rRNA催化肽键形成（氨基与羧基脱去一分子水）

    • Termination: 走到了终止密码子，没有tRNA与终止密码子配对，无氨基酸; factors（与tRNA形状很像，这是结构学基础）结合到tRNA的位置，解理核糖体、释放多肽链

    • Polysome: poly-ribosome, several ribosomes that can translate an mRNA at the same time

    • Regulation of translation (调控)

      • initiation：决定整体翻译效率、哪些mRNA被翻译。 The expression level of elF4E is increased in cancer.
        • Eukaryotic initiation factor 4F (eIF4F) is a heterotrimeric protein complex（蛋白质复合物） that binds the 5’ cap of messenger RNAs (mRNAs) to promote eukaryotic translation initiation.
        • Protein complex: A protein complex or multiprotein complex is a group of two or more associated polypeptide chains. Protein complexes are distinct from multienzyme complexes, in which multiple catalytic domains are found in a single polypeptide chain.
      • translation: tRNA的丰度也可能决定mRNA翻译水平
      • efficiency metric: poly-ribosome profiling 多聚核糖体展示
        • Drug: cycloheximide (CHX) for freezing ribosome 固定住核糖体
        • Velocity sedimentation: 密度梯度离心，结合的核糖体越多，密度越大、因此越往下，可以认为翻译效率越高、基因表达越活跃

3.2 Folding

  • 一级结构氨基酸序列的不同导致其理化性质不同，氨基酸序列决定了三级结构的折叠特性

  • Self-Assembly: e.g., molten globules [1995, Nature Struc. Biol. 2: 281]

  • Molecule Chaperone: 分子伴侣，帮助新生肽链折叠、组装、跨膜定位和成熟为活性蛋白的一类蛋白分子

    • 翻译共折叠：Co-translational folding
    • Hsp70、Hsp60

  • Secondary Structure

    • $\alpha-$helix 螺旋：most are right-handed, dependent on hydrogen bond between N- H & C=O
    • $\beta-$sheet 折叠
    • $\beta-$turn 转角

  • Motif 模序

    • corresponding to translation factor

3.3 Localization

细胞质/内质网上核糖体翻译出来的蛋白，将去哪里、如何到特定的部位发生功能？

  • post-translational transport

  • co-translational transport: 主要是通道蛋白、分泌蛋白，要跨越膜系统

    • Signal Recognition Paritical (SRP): 存在于细胞质中的11S的核糖核蛋白复合物，识别信号序列 (signal peptide 信号肽)，并将核糖体引导到内质网上

    • SRP receptor

Cell Biology

  • Size / Dimension

  • Nucleus

    • Nuclear Pore 核孔复合体:
      • 较大的蛋白质进入，需要 nuclear localization signal (NLS)
      • 核内蛋白泵出，需要 nuclear export signal (NES)
    • 进核和出核：需要蛋白的帮助，importin、exportin
    • Identification of NLS （寻找和定位序列NLS）:
      • 鉴定：充分必要条件——有能进核、没有不能进核，则为NLS
      • 融合蛋白技术，剪切基因序列，利用质粒表达融合蛋白

  • Endomembrane System

    • Endoplasmic Reticulum, ER

      • Staining: dioc6

      • SER (Smooth ER) / RER (Rough ER)

      • 内质网表面的核糖体：翻译出绝大多数的核糖体

      • ER Stress and disease: 蛋白质流通受阻，导致许多未折叠蛋白在内质网附近堆积，导致产生 ER stress

    • Golgi apparatus

      • 由数个扁平囊泡堆在一起形成的高度有极性的细胞器
      • 依据蛋白质上的信号肽或信号斑，对蛋白进行分类
      • Staining: GM130

    • Lysosomes

      • 分解各种外源和内源的大分子物质

    • Mitochondrion

      • 通过 氧化磷酸化 作用合成ATP
      • 有自己的一套编码系统，依赖于一部分自己的、一部分核内的遗传信息，目前被认为是外源性的
      • Reactive oxygen species (ROS) 活性氧类
      • Oxidative stress
      • Staining： Janus Green B

    • Cytoskeleton

    • Extracellular Matrix (ECM) 细胞外基质

      • 影响细胞的存活、决定细胞的形状

      • Collagen 胶原等

3.4 Modification

  • Irreversible modification: 多为切割

    • Removal of N-Met (N端甲硫氨酸)
    • Proteolytic processing (蛋白酶切割)
      • e.g., blood coagulation
      • Caspase 胱天蛋白酶: serve as a primary effector during apoptosis to proteolytically dismantle most cellular structures

  • reversible modification: chemical

    • Phosphorylation 磷酸化
      • kinase 激酶：水解ATP，介导磷酸化。能够催化从高能供体分子转移磷酸基团到特定靶分子（底物）的酶
      • 一般而言，磷酸化的目的是“激活”或“能化”底物，增大它的能量，以使其可参加随后的自由能负变化的反应。
    • Acetylation 乙酰化
      • 组蛋白的乙酰化修饰与表观遗传学（epigenetics）
      • 组织蛋白（histone，组蛋白）是真核生物体细胞染色质与原核细胞中的碱性蛋白质，和DNA共同组成核小体结构
    • Methylation 甲基化
    • Ubiquitination 泛素化
    • Glycosylation 糖基化
      • N-糖基化、O-糖基化：是蛋白质成熟的重要标志
      • 功能：帮助正确折叠、防止降解（against proteolysis）、形成胞外基质（ECM）、调制免疫反应
    • Myristylation 十四烷基化
    • Farnesylation 法尼基化

Detection of Modification

  • 抗体：识别特定的抗原位点
  • 1D or 2D gel：磷酸化后分子量上升
  • Mass spectrometry：可以鉴定未知的修饰
  • 功能性研究：mutation method
  • Chromatin immunoprecipitation 染色质免疫沉淀

3.5 Degradation

  • Lysosome

    • non-specific

  • Non-lysosome

    • specifically, ATP–dependent
    • ubiquitin-proteasome pathway
      • Proteasome：蛋白酶体是一种巨型筒状蛋白质复合体，主要作用是通过打断肽键来实现降解细胞不需要的或受到损伤的蛋白质。 蛋白酶体是细胞用来调控特定蛋白质的浓度和除去错误折叠蛋白质的主要机制。需要被降解的蛋白质会先被一个称为泛素的小型蛋白质所标记。这一标记反应是被泛素连接酶所催化。
        • Structure: core particle (catalytic particle) + 2 x regulatory particle

  • Ubiquitin：76个氨基酸的小肽

    • 泛素小史–田中启二
    • 三个酶：E1 (activation), E2 (conjugation), E3 (ligation)
    • Detection: Western Blot, 1D or 2D gel, MS

3.6 Characteristics

Amino Acids

  • over 300 natural amino acids on earth, only 20 participate in protein formation

  • classification

    • non-polar (hydrophobic)
    • polar (hydrophilic): acidic, basic

  • 特性

    • Have both acid and base properties （两性解离）
      • 可加氢变酸性，也可去氢变碱性
      • isoelectric point 等电点：the pH at which a particular molecule or surface carries no net electrical charge
    • Aromatic acids absorb light in the near-ultraviolet （芳香族氨基酸的近紫外吸收）
    • Colored by ninhydrin （茚三酮反应）
      • 蛋白质降解后，进行离子交换柱层析，可以对分出来的每种氨基酸用茚三酮反应进行定量分析
    • Edman Reaction
      • 利用PITC（苯异硫氰酸酯）
      • 对肽链的N端氨基酸进行鉴定

  • Peptide

    • The peptide plane

Separation & Purification

  • Based on protein size
    • Dialysis（透析）、ultrafiltration（超滤）：蛋白质去盐、浓缩
    • gel filtration chromatography 凝胶过滤层析：大分子蛋白不进入凝胶珠子，先出来
    • SDS–PolyAcrylamide Gel Electrophoresis (SDS–PAGE): 聚丙烯酰胺凝胶电泳
      • SDS: denature the protein & make the all protein charged
      • 变性胶
    • density gradient centrifugation 密度梯度离心
      • 超速离心，分离大的蛋白复合体，根据蛋白质大小进行分离
  • Based on protein charge
    • isoelectric focusing 等电聚焦
    • Electrophoresis 电泳
      • 2D Electrophoresis 双向电泳：1D for Isoelectric focusing, 1D for SDS PAGE
    • ion-exchange chromatography 离子交换层析
      • 不同蛋白等电点不同，相同pH所带电荷不同，和盐粒子结合能力也不同
      • 阳离子交换层析珠、阴离子交换层析珠
  • Based on hydrophobicity
    • hydrophobic interaction chromatography 疏水作用层析
  • Affinity
    • Affinity chromatography 亲和层析
      • Enzyme–substrate binding
      • Receptor–ligand binding
      • Antibody–antigen binding
        • His/GST/HA/FLAG tags

Primary structure analysis

  • Protein Sequencing 测序
    • Frederick Sanger 两次诺贝尔化学奖！一次DNA测序，一次蛋白质测序，tql
  • Mass spectrometry 质谱

Tertiary structure analysis

  • X-ray Crystalography
  • etc.

Protein classification by functions

  • Enzymes
  • Regulartory proteins
  • Recptors
  • Signal proteins
  • Structural proteins
  • Motor proteins
  • Transport proteins
  • Inmunoglobulin or antibodies
  • Storage proteins
  • Others

3.7 Interaction

Protein-protein interaction

  • 竞争性抑制态的研究

    • Science 2002, 298: 846–850

  • Tagged Fusion Proteins (Pull-down) 沉降实验

    • 利用亲和法分离获得带有标签的“诱饵蛋白” (prey), 与prey蛋白相互作用的蛋白质将被同时下拉下来
    • 用质谱对拉下来的蛋白进行鉴定

  • Co-immunoprecipitation (Co-IP) 免疫共沉淀

    • immunoprecipitation (IP): 利用抗体富集感兴趣的蛋白
    • 利用抗体分离获得带有标签的“诱饵蛋白” (prey), 与prey蛋白相互作用的蛋白质将被同时下拉下来

  • Yeast Two-hybrid (Y-2-H) 酵母双杂交

    • 基因工程的方法，如果能相互作用，则可以将下游基因表达启动

  • Fluorescence Resonace Energy Trasfer (FRET) 荧光共振能量转移

    • 两蛋白距离接近时 (<10nm) 满足荧光波长条件可以发生FRET
    • 如果有相互作用，则供体荧光变弱、受体荧光变强
    • 需要外源导入荧光蛋白，现在不太常做了
    • 应用—Biosensors
      • Nature Biotechnology, 2002, 21: 807–812
      • Nature 1997, 388: 882–887

  • Biacore (Surface Plasmon Resonance, SPR) 表面等离子共振

    • 玻璃+金属膜，全反射入射时的倏逝波引发金属中的自由电子产生表面等离子体，当表面等离子体与倏逝波频率相等时，将发生共振吸收，全反射光急剧减弱
    • 共振角的改变与所结合的分子质量改变有关

Protein-RNA interaction

  • Electrophoretic mobility shift assays (EMSA)
    • 蛋白质与RNA结合后分子量增加，电泳速度减慢
  • RNA pull-down
    • 下拉 RNA，同时获得其结合的蛋白质
    • 下拉：在RNA上标记生物素 (T4–RNA ligase)，然后用珠子 (streptavidin magnet beads，链球菌磁铁珠) 把它吸过来
  • RNA Immunoprecipitation (RIP)
    • 免疫沉淀蛋白质，同时获得其结合的RNA
  • CLIP (Cross–Linking and Immunoprecipitation)–Seq
  • 利用了逆转录，可以鉴定RNA–蛋白质结合位点

Protein–DNA interaction

  • EMSA
  • DNA pull-down
  • CHIP (Chromatin Immunoprecipitation)
    • 免疫沉淀蛋白质，同时获得与其结合的染色质DNA

4 Genetics

梁洪青，浙江大学医学院遗传学研究所、医学院附属妇产科医院

遗传学：关注的更多是DNA/染色质层面是怎么影响到表型 (phenotypes) 的

  • Key question: What is the most challenging biological event for cell to and the maintain genetic and epigenetic stability?

4.1 Cell cycle and the maintenance of genetic stability

  • Cell cycle: M,G1, S, G2

  • assembly of pre-replication complex

    • origin licencing complex: Cdt1, Cdt2

  • DNA helicase and DNA unwinding

    • Topoisomerase
      • Topoisomerase-inhibitor leads to DNA breaks (anti-cancer drugs)

  • Replication origins are fired with different schedule

  • Chromosome occupies defined territory

  • Chromosome domains: active/repressed chromatin

  • Chromosome firing happens in domains

  • Chromatin domainstrength is affected during cell cycle progression

    • weakened domain boundary

  • Replication speed and replication stress

    • 放射性元素添加与撤出：测速度
    • 胚胎干细胞：DNA复制快，但是修复能力强，可以有效应对复制压力

  • Replication checkpoint stabilizes fork stalling

    • replication fork reversal

  • DNA damage response: DNA damage checkpoint

    • 停顿细胞周期

  • Genetic variation

    • Chromosome variation
      • numerica 来源：chromosome segregation
      • structural
    • DNA variation: nucleotide
      • genetic mutation
        • polymorphism and mutation
        • SNPs: a single nucleotide polymorphism, small genetic variation, very similar to point mutations
      • copy number variation (microsatellite repeats variation)

  • Centrosome Cycle 中心体周期

4.2 Epigenetic inheritence and stability

  • Inheritance of histone methylation during cell cycle
    • DNA复制时，组蛋白脱落，复制完在加回去，这时一半的组蛋白是新合成的，没有组蛋白修饰（表观修饰），但是在之后的细胞周期会补回，这些新的组蛋白会逐渐被修饰
  • epigenetic reprogramming
    • 表观变化：可逆的
    • partial reprogramming [10.1038/srep44840]

4.3 Genetics and diseases

Genetic disorders

  • Monogenetic disorder 单基因

    • Expressivity 表现度
    • Penetrance 外显率
    • Pleotropic 多效性
    • Heterogeneity 异质性

  • Polygenetic disorder

    • Normal distribution of allele frequency
    • Phenotype transfer function: phenotype multifactorial inhertance depends on transfer function
    • “regression of average ”: 极端表型趋近于平均值

  • GWAS (Genome–Wide Association Study)

    • Association study 关联性研究：to identify genetic risk factor

  • Mitochondrial genes

    • prone to mutation (no histone protection, etc.)
    • Mitochondrial disorder –> energy –> neurosystem
    • e.g. MELAS disease

  • Genetic imprinting and phenotype

    • Gene imprinting: 基因的蛋白质修饰（甲基化）
    • DNA methylation to repress gene expression
    • Maternal imprinting, Paternal imprinting
    • imprinted genes play an important role in development
    • e.g. Angelman syndrome
    • assisted reproductive technology (ART) associated with greater risk of imprinting disorders: ART is performed during the critical periods of epigenetic reprogramming

  • Cellular genetic variation

  • Genetic approaches to treat diseases

    • classification

    • strategy

      • In-vivo; ex-vivo

    • delivery

    • e.g., Regeneration of the entire human epidermis using transgenic stem cells [Nature 2017]

    • e.g., Chimeric antigen receptor T cells (CAR-T therapy)

5 Cell Communication

Intercellular/Intracellular Signaling 胞间/胞内信号转导

  • Gap junction / myoendothelial junction
  • Nanotube
  • Receptors
  • MAPK signaling pathway
  • GPCR signaling pathway

https://classroom.zju.edu.cn/livingroom?course_id=43566&sub_id=749763&tenant_code=112

Appendix

1 Techniques

Protein

  • 流式细胞分选：FACS（fluorescence-activated cell sorting），利用荧光素标记不同的分子，通过调节合适的电压、补偿等，通过荧光将目的细胞与非目的细胞区分开来，用于分离纯化细胞。
  • Cas9 基因敲除
  • 蛋白质检测：Western-blot
  • Ribosome Profiling (Ribosome Footprinting)
    • Ingolia, NT. et al. Science. 2009
    • Ingolia, NT. et al. Nat Rev Genet, 2014.
  • 分子克隆

DNA replication

  • 2-dimensional DNA electrophoresis 二维电泳
  • DNA fiber spreading
    • 把DNA梳开
  • 电镜

Mitosis visualization

  • Giemsa stain (G banding)
  • Visualize mitotic chromosomes: FISH and SKY (Spectral Karyotyping)
  • Comparative genomic hybridization (CGH)

2 Definitions

  • Svedberg Units: abbreviated S. The ribosomal subunits are characterized by the Svedberg units. These units are based on the rate at which subunits sediment in a solvent; concomitantly, this is derived from the measurement of a parameter called the apparent sedimentation coefficient.

3 Good Experiments

  • NLS identification

4 Thoughts

  • 为什么start codon是AUG
  • 为什么少量的DNA编码着大量的蛋白质

5 Ideas

  • Use the optical characteristics to perform the cell-based identification.

  • 激光能促使蛋白重新正确折叠吗

6 Resource

  • National Center for Biotechnology Information NCBI

  • 标准蛋白氨基酸列表 Stand Amino Acids

  • 收集药物靶点蛋白质和类药小分子之间相互作用亲和力的数据库 BindingDB

  • ENCODE https://www.encodeproject.org/

    • data
    • encyclopedia: Genomic and Transcriptomic Annotations (high-quality)

  • Online catalog of human genes and genetic disorders: Online Mendelian Inherentance in Man OMIM

entry.title: Scientific Writing Notes
entry.content:
科技写作（光电–狄大卫/王攀）

好期刊不是科研的追求，成果才是。

科研的核心：总结，归纳，最终能把自己做的用少数几个词凝练出来。

1 基本概念与文献调研

  • 影响因子: 某期刊前两年（S, T）发表的论文在统计当年（U）的被引用总次数 X , 除以该期刊在前两年（S, T）内发表的论文总数 Y。公式为：
    $$
    \mathrm{IF}_U = \frac{X(S,T)}{Y(S,T)}
    $$

    • 本刊2009年的文章在2010年的被引次数：48；本刊2009年的发文量：187

      本刊2008年的文章在2010年的被引次数：128；本刊2008年的发文量：154

      本刊2010年的影响因子：IF = (48+128) / (187+154) = 0.5161

  • SCI 论文分区：中国科学院文献情报中心根据目前SCI核心库将所有期刊分为数学、物理、化学、生物、地学、天文、工程技术、医学、环境科学、农林科学、社会科学、管理科学及综合性期刊13大类。然后，将13大类期刊分各自为 4 个等级，即 4 个区。按照各类期刊影响因子划分，前5%为该类 1 区、6% ～ 20% 为 2 区、21% ～ 50% 为 3 区，其余的为 4 区。

  • H–index：h代表“高引用次数”（high citations），一名科研人员的h指数是指他 至多有h篇论文分别被引用了至少h次。

  • Formality:

    • Full words. e.g., can’t –> cannot, won’t –> will not
    • a lot –> many
    • totally –> completely
    • at the same time –> simulataneously
    • Interesting –> compelling

学位论文：不要追求写得长，要追求原创性和逻辑性；

  • 对课题组的同学、同一个学校的同学，是一个重要参考资料！

2 参考文献的管理与排版

  • 高效看文献
    • 要 get 什么：带着问题和目的去找文献
    • 不求甚解的精神（略读，扫文献）
    • Critical thinking

3 描述研究成果

  • Use adj. and adv. sparingly
    • Both of the two samples had very similar concentrations –> The two samples had similar concentrations
    • Avoid ‘significantly’, unless have statistic reference
  • Focus on science, not scientist
  • Avoid empty transitional statements
    • e.g., actually
    • Useful statements: conversely, consequently / to this end, typically / in general
  • Choose simple words over complex
    • In order to –> to
    • has the capacity to –> can
    • a number of –> many / several
    • despite the fact that –> although

时态和语态

  • 研究的实验工作：过去时
  • 描述事实结果：现在时
  • 引述别人工作：现在时或现在完成时

Introduction

  • 开门见山，不绕圈子，避免大篇幅讲述历史渊源
  • 回顾历史有重点，找有代表性的

Discussion 部分

  • 创造性见解，精炼回答为什么出现这样的结果，以及出现这样的结果意味着什么，逻辑要清晰

  • 主要的发现

  • 结果的说明、阐释或论述、推论

  • 与前人结果的比较

  • 结果的意义和重要性、应用

  • 研究的局限和不足之处，尚未回答的问题及局限性对研究的影响，建议进一步的研究方向

Conclusion 部分

  • 一句话总结
  • 技术的优势和拓展应用

Supplementary 部分

  • 放不太重要、但有助于理解结果的实验和讨论

Figures and Tables

  • 先总说
  • 再有逻辑、递进性地描述图表结果
  • 讨论

Title

  • 清楚性

    • Highly efficient waveguide grating couplers using silicon-on-insulator (Emphasis: waveguide grating couplers)
    • Silicon-on-insulator for high-output waveguide grating couplers (Emphasis: silicon-on-sinsulator)

  • 主副题名

  • e.g.

    • Low-loss 与 surface smoothness, diameter uniformity
      • Low-loss 在 high-level
      • Subwavelength-diameter silica wire for low-loss optical wave guiding
    • 包含凸显性能的关键信息
    • 要吸引人看
      • Single-Nanowire Single-Mode Laser
      • Highly elastic ice microfiber –> Elastic ice microfiber: Highly 太泛泛不准确

PPT 展示

  • 图片出处标注：无作者信息，杂志名采用缩写形式，随后是期号（黑体）、首页页码、发表年份

  • 原则：让观众最快获取有用信息

论文投稿

牵扯到人，在哪里都会有偏见或者倾向性的，那也没办法

  • 期刊选择

    • 原理、材料、结构等的重大创新，性能的显著提高：好一点的期刊

    • 前人工作的改进优化：中下的期刊

    • 期刊所规定的范围

    • 期刊的论文平均水平

  • 投稿前的准备工作: 系统里要填很多东西，投个稿也是很累的

    • Manuscript

    • Tables, Figures, Movies

    • Supplementary materials

    • Cover Letter

      • an excellent opportunity to briefly discuss the importance of the submitted work and why it is appropriate for the journal

      • Spend time writing a convincing cover letter and share it with your coauthors for their input

    • Email and address for each author

    • Suggested reviewers (name, affiliation, emails)

  • 申诉：审稿人误解/没理解/有很强偏见（好的工作，机会难得）

  • 发表过一篇文章后，可以申请当审稿人

科技写作（医学–邹炜/邹键）

Writing a scientific article

  • Read the author guideline!
  • Figures: One figure, one question
    • figure的逻辑、框架可以提前思考准备
  • Discussion:
    • Indicate uses, extensions, and limitations
    • suggest future experiments and point out those that are underway
  • Supplementary Material: 不是不重要放到了附录，而是由于篇幅限制才放到了附录
  • Start writing
    • Paper: Introduction –> Methods & Materials –> Results –>Discussion –> Figures & Tables
    • Write: Abstract –> Results –> Figures & Tables –> Methods & Materials –> Introduction –> Discussion –> Abstract (revision)

Cover Letter (投稿信)

  • Basic information
  • Cover letter is your chance to speak to the editor directly
  • Mention what makes the paper special to the journel
  • Confine the length to 2/3 page

Revision, and response to reviewers

  • Cherish the chance of discussion your work directly with other scientists in your community. Please prepare a detailed letter of response.
  • Cut and paste each comment by the reviewer. Answer it directly below. State specifically what changes you have made to the manuscript. Identify the page and line number.
  • Provide a scientific response to the comment you accept; or a convicing, solid and polite rebuttal to the point you think the reviewer is wrong.

Rejection

  • Try to understand why the paper was rejected.
  • Re-evaluate your work and decide whether it is appropriate to submit the paper elsewhere. If so, begin as if you are going to write a new article.

个人积累

Some comments from the editor.

  • Note that terms such as “notably,” “indeed,” and “surprisingly” are redundant in scientific writing and can be deleted as they add no relevance.
  • The n-dash (–) could be used instead of “to” but not hyphen (-). For example, 15–25 mm implies 15 to 25 mm. here is a nice demonstration, here is how to type them

deep-learning-empowered

Expensive flower-filled vase

Expensive-flower-filled vase

  • The use of too many words to convey one idea can muddle the message and divert the reader’s attention. Therefore, in writing, especially academic writing, ideas need to be conveyed as concisely as possible. One way of doing this is to use concise alternatives to phrases. For example, the phrase “all over the world” can be replaced with the word “globally” or “worldwide.”

  • Where possible, a direct verb (action) should be used instead of using a noun and verb. For example, “segmentation of images was done” can be replaced with “images were segmented,” which is clearer and preferred in academic writing.

Example
Avoid: Spectral imaging is essentially beneficial for an ocean of applications that require both spectral and spatial information at high resolution. Better: Several applications requiring both spectral and spatial information at high resolution benefit from spectral imaging.

Some useful word revision from the editor.

  • While —> Although

  • Here —> In this study

  • These improvements enable us —> enabled us

  • whole —> entire

  • inaccessible —> unreachable

  • Defects —> limitations

  • Unsurprisingly —> Nevertheless

  • confining —> limiting

  • may —> might

  • Besides —> In addition

  • Since —> Because

Some classical mistakes.

  • is —> was

  • spectral and spatial detections are simultaneously expected —> spectral and spatial detection is

Common phrases.

  • because of, due to

early methods –> early endeavors

later works developed more methods –> later works involved more methods

It therefore failed to –> it thereby failing to

The key difference between thereby and therefore is that thereby means “by that means” or “as a result of that” whereas therefore means “for that reason” or consequently.

additionally–>besides

https://home.soka.ac.jp/~alex/sokhome06b/ess/transwords.html

Sec. 1 –> Section 1

Additional –> Extra

deep learning is able to handle the complicated combination-architecture model. –> deep learning allows to handle the complicated combination-architecture model.

enough to –>sufficient for

which is –> namely

美化篇

Deep neural networks has been applied widely in reconstruction process of spectral imaging. –> The past decade has witnessed a rapid expansion of deep neural networks applications in reconstruction of spectral imaging.

We think reinforcement learning (RL) can be used to change this condition. –> We barely believe that we have fully exploited the potential of neural networks. To maximize their performance, one may consider introducing reinforcement learning (RL) technique.

单词篇

endure

endeavor

notable

语法篇

The computational spectral imaging method has resorted to computation power for reduced system volume.

根据强调的内容（后句），把后句的but改成前句的though

词义篇

Hence and thus have the same basic meaning and are often interchangeable. However, there is a slight difference. Hence usually refers to the future. Thus usually refers to the past. It is often used to indicate a conclusion.

  • Both sides played well, thus no winner was declared.
  • The situation is getting more and more complicated. Hence we will have to proceed with caution. (NOT Thus we will have to proceed with caution.)

资源篇

https://twitter.com/jbhuang0604/status/1437931021706612736

其他

A-xxed B 就是 B is xxed by A. | computer-assisted diagnosis

A-xxing B 就是 B xx A. | privacy-enhancing techniques

光纤陀螺的光学系统

误差分析

设强度误差和相位误差为 $k$ 和 $\phi_d$ ，探测的光强信号为:
$$
\begin{aligned}
I&=I_0\left|1+ke^{i\phi_d}\right|^2=I_0\left[\left(1+k\cos\phi_d\right)^2+(k\cos\phi_d)^2\right]\
&=I_0(1+\underbrace{2k\cos\phi_d}{相位误差}+\underbrace{k^2}{强度误差})
\end{aligned}
$$
若 $\phi_d$ 为毫弧度、$k$ 也在千分之一，则相位误差也会在毫弧度，相比之下强度误差会增大一个数量级；而精度需要保证为微弧度，这就需要对相位误差进行控制。

如何控制？$\phi_d$ 是随机的，一般无法控制，可以尽可能减小 $k$ 强度噪声。

陀螺的信号处理系统

相位调制

  • 正弦调制：$\phi_m=\phi_{m0}\sin(2\pi f_m t)$
  • 方波调制：$\phi_m=\phi_{m0}\ \mathrm{sign}(t)$
  • 固定相位调制：$\phi_m(t)=k_0\cdot t$
  • 时延差分调制（互易干涉仪所特有，源自到达调制器的时间不同）：$\Delta\phi_m(t)=\phi_{m0}\ \left(\mathrm{sign}(t)-\mathrm{sign}(t-\Delta\tau_g)\right)$
  • 闭环调制解调：将光强看为检测目标，动态反馈补偿，得到信号相位的相反数，比直接用光强计算误差小

莫尔条纹原理

  • 移动光栅、固定光栅、光源、探测器

  • 光栅测量的基本原理：两块光栅尺，夹角为 $\theta$

    • 沿垂直于栅线方向做相对运动，莫尔条纹便沿着栅线方向近似相同的方向做相应的移动
    • 栅线运动–>莫尔条纹移动，进行了放大

  • 几何光学原理

    • 从直线方程间隔可推出：
      $$
      \begin{aligned}
      &W=P_1 P_2 /\left(P_1^2+P_2^2-2 P_1 P_2 \cos \theta\right)^{\frac{1}{2}} \
      &\sin \varphi=P_1 \sin \theta /\left(P_1^2+P_2^2-2 P_1 P_2 \cos \theta\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}
      \end{aligned}
      $$

    • ​ $P_1=P_2=P$ 时，
      $$
      W=\frac{P}{2\sin(\theta/2)}\approx\frac{P}{\theta}.
      $$

  • 衍射干涉原理

    • 光栅栅距很小时，需要考虑衍射效应：两次光栅衍射

    • 光栅方程：$\pm k\lambda=d(\sin i\pm \sin\theta)$, 法线同侧加异侧减，原理是光程差的计算

  • 游标式莫尔条纹: $P_2=P_1(1-\Delta)$

  • 莫尔条纹倍增器：$P_2=MP_1$

  • 直线度精密测量

  • 测量表面微形貌到分布的光泄漏

  • 莫尔条纹的傅立叶分析

entry.title: Optical Communication Notes
entry.content:
光通信技术

Imagine yourself a researcher working about thirty years ago. Your project: Find a way to transmit a light signal for communications.

1 Fiber Basics

Fiber Structure

Important Angles

  • $\alpha_c$: critical propagation angle 传播过程中与光轴的夹角

$$
\cos\alpha_c=\sin\theta_c=\frac{n_2}{n_1}
$$

  • $2\theta_a$: acceptance angle

$$
\mathrm{NA}:=\sin\theta_a=\sqrt{n_1^2-n_2^2}
$$

Numerical Aperture

$\mathrm{NA}$: numerical aperture
$$
\mathrm{NA}=n\sqrt{2\Delta},
$$
where $n=(n_1+n_2)/2,\Delta=(n_1-n_2)/n.$

Based on its physical meaning, numerical aperture can be calculated using
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\mathrm{NA}
=\sqrt{\frac{P_{in}}{P_{out}}}
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$
for a lambert light source.

Rectangular waveguide

$$ \nabla_{xy}^2\mathbf{E}+h^2\mathbf{E}=0, $$ with $h$ ( whcih I think can be regarded as *lateral wavenumber*) $$ h^2=\gamma^2+k^2=\left(\frac{l\pi}{a}\right)^2+\left(\frac{m\pi}{b}\right)^2 $$ where $\gamma=\alpha+j\beta,k=\omega/v,v=1/\sqrt{\epsilon\mu}.$

  • cutoff frequence / wavelength
    $$
    \begin{aligned}
    \gamma=0\implies &f_c=\omega_c/2\pi=\frac{k_c v}{2\pi}=\frac{hv}{2\pi}\
    &\lambda_c=v/f_c=2\pi/h
    \end{aligned}
    $$

  • guide wavelength 导波波长
    $$
    \lambda_g=\frac{2\pi}{\beta}=\frac{\lambda}{\sqrt{1-(f/f_c)^2}}
    $$

  • critical relation
    $$
    \begin{aligned}
    \beta&=k\sqrt{1-(f/f_c)^2},\
    \frac{1}{\lambda^2}&=\frac{1}{\lambda_g^2}+\frac{1}{\lambda_c^2}.
    \end{aligned}
    $$

  • V值
    $$
    V=\frac{\pi d}{\lambda}\text{NA},
    $$
    其中 $d$ 是芯层直径 (core diameter), $\lambda$ 是真空中波长 (vacuum wavelength).

  • Number of modes

    For a large $V$ number (>20), a step–index fiber approximately has $N=V^2/2$ modes, a graded–index fiber has $N=V^2/4$ modes.

  • 有效折射率 (effective refractive index)

    For step-index fiber:
    $$
    n_{\text{eff}}=\frac{c_0}{v_\text{guide}}=\frac{c_0}{\omega/\beta}=\frac{c_0}{k_1c_1/(k_1\cos\alpha)}=n_1\cos\alpha
    $$
    注意 $\alpha$ 是传播角，不同模式的 $\alpha$ 不同，角频率
    $$
    \omega=kc=k_1c_1=\frac{2\pi n_1}{\lambda}\frac{c_0}{n_1}
    $$
    是不变量。

Modes

Light entering an optical fiber breaks down into discrete beams (travelling at a seperate propagation angle) called modes, which are stable electromagnetic field patterns existing within the fiber.

Three Types

  • Guided mode

    • Maxwell方程的解，满足全反射条件，在芯层中传输

    • 导模的传播常数 $\beta$ 范围
      $$
      \begin{equation}
      \begin{split}
      k&=\frac{2\pi n}{\lambda}\
      \beta_{\max}&=k=\frac{2\pi n_1}{\lambda}\
      \beta_{\min}&=k\cos\alpha=\frac{2\pi n_1}{\lambda}\frac{n_2}{n_1}=\frac{2\pi n_2}{\lambda}
      \end{split}
      \end{equation}
      $$

  • Radiation mode

    • Maxwell方程的解，但不满足全反射条件，在包层中传输

  • Leaky mode

    • 不是Maxwell方程的解，传输一定距离就损耗完了

Phase and group velocities

$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
y_1&=A\sin(\beta_1 z-\omega_1 t),\ y_2=A\sin(\beta_2 z-\omega_2t)
\
y_1+y_2&=2A\sin(\beta_{\text{avg}}x-\omega_{\text{avg}}t)\cdot \cos(\frac{\Delta \beta}{2}x-\frac{\Delta \omega }{2}t)
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$

$\cos$ 项的频率显然更低，因此成为叠加波的包络，包络速度是群速度
$$
v_g=\frac{\partial \omega}{\partial \beta}
$$
而相速度是点速度
$$
v=\frac{\text{d}z}{\text{d}t}=\frac{\omega}{\beta}.
$$

Linear Polarized Modes

  • TEM 没有纵向 (z方向) 的场分量，TE有 $H_z$, TM 有 $E_z$, HE的 $H_z>E_z$, EH的 $E_z>H_z$
  • 在弱导近似 (weakly guided-mode approximation) 条件下模式简并得到LP模
  • $\text{LP}_{lm}$ 中的 $l$ 是 $\varphi$ 方向峰值个数的一半，$m$ 是$r$ 方向

Attenuation

Classification: Bending (macro, micro), Scattering and Aborption

Calculation：
$$
Loss(\text{dB})=10\lg(P_{in}/P_{out})
$$

  • Measurement: cut method（截断法），好处是长光纤和短光纤相减消去了固定的功率计、光纤的接入损耗

  • Attenuation per fiber length $A$
    $$
    A(\text{dB/km})=loss(\text{dB})/L(\text{km})\implies P_{out}=P_{in}10^{-AL/10}
    $$

  • Attenuation constant $\alpha$
    $$
    \frac{dP}{dz}=-\alpha P\implies P_{out}=P_{in}e^{-\alpha L}
    $$

  • Relation
    $$
    A(\text{dB/km})=\frac{10}{L}\lg{\left[\frac{P_{in}}{P_{in}\times e^{-\alpha L}}\right]}=10\alpha\lg e=4.34\alpha\ (\text{1/km})
    $$

Intrinsic

Material resonances and scattering introduced from material.

  • Rayleigh scattering

    • from irregular positions of molecules of silicon dioxide which causes variations in refractive index

    • wavelength depending

  • intrinsic absorption

    • from oscillation of molecules, atoms, electrons

Extrinsic

Impurity absorption and bending of fiber.

  • impurity absorption

    • from $\text{OH}^{-1}$ , aborption peaks at 2750nm, but since the oscillations are nonlinear, they have subharmonics at 945,1240 and 1380nm
    • Transparent windows: 850nm, 1300nm, 1550nm

  • Macro-bending

    • 光纤的整体弯曲
    • The more light power confined within the core, the less sensitive the fiber is with respect to bending

  • Micro-bending

    • 光纤的局部弯曲
    • Microbending results in transferring power from guided modes to radiation modes
    • Microbending loss in multimode fiber is practically wavelength indendent 与波长无关
    • A multimode fiber is less sensitive to microbending than is a singlemode fiber

Power Confinement

  • The higher the order of the mode, the less the percentage of total power it carries.

  • $$
    \frac{P_{\text{clad}}}{P_{\text{core}}}=\frac{2\sqrt 2}{3V}
    $$

Dispersion

Intermodal dispersion : 不同模式走的光程不同造成到达时间不同，导致波形展宽
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\Delta t_{\text{modal}}&=t_c-t_0\
&=\frac{Ln_1}{\cos\alpha c_0}-\frac{Ln_1}{c_0}\
&=\frac{Ln_1}{c_0}\left(\frac{n_1-n_2}{n_2}\right)\
&\approx\frac{Ln_1}{c_0}\Delta\approx\frac{L}{2n_2c_0}\text{NA}^2
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$

解决方案：

  • 使用渐变折射率光纤（graded–index fiber），由低到高阶模折射率降低，补偿光程
  • 使用单模光纤

Chromatic Dispersion：If the mode were composed of light comprising different colors (wavelengths) , they will arrive at the receiver end at different time, causing output light pulse to spread, this is chromatic dispersion. (intramodal)
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\Delta_{\text{chrom}}&=D(\lambda)L\Delta\lambda,\
D(\lambda)&=\frac{\text{d}\tau_g}{\text{d}\lambda}=\frac{\text{d}(1/v_g)}{\text{d}\lambda}=-\frac{\lambda}{c}\frac{\partial^2 n}{\partial^2\lambda}
\&=\frac{S_0}{4}\left(\lambda-\frac{\lambda_0^4}{\lambda^3}\right),
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$
公式中 $\lambda_0$ 是零色散波长，$\lambda$ 是工作波长，$S_0$ 是 $\lambda_0$ 处的色散斜率。

total dispersion：pulse spreading during transmission along the fiber si called dispersion.
$$
\Delta_{\text{total}}=\sqrt{\Delta t_{\text{modal}}^2+\Delta t_{\text{chrom}}^2}
$$

Bit rate and Bandwidth

工程中对BW的要求：
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
BW&<\frac{1}{4\Delta t_{\text{total}}},
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$
BW 是带宽，表示光纤支持的一定频率内的脉冲，一个脉冲可以看成1个bit，因此就有 BW=BR（比特率），但有时候101010这样的比特序列会导致10只有一个脉冲，因此频率减半，这时 BW=BR/2。

光带宽与电带宽

$$
\Delta f_{光}=\sqrt{2}\Delta f_{电}
$$

电的半高全宽要求光的0.707高全宽。

推导：功率带宽积是常数：
$$
BW\times P_{光}=\text{Const}
$$
光带宽对应最大光功率的一半：
$$
\Delta f_{光}\times \frac{1}{2}P_{光}=\text{C}
$$
电带宽对应最大电功率的一半，最大光功率的 $\sqrt{2}/2$：
$$
\Delta f_{电}\times\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}P_{光}=\text{C}
$$
于是：
$$
\Delta f_{光}=\sqrt{2}\Delta f_{电.}
$$

Bandwidth–Length product limit

$$
(BR\times L)_{\max}=\frac{1}{4\sigma_\lambda D(\lambda)}.
$$

光纤长度越长，由于损耗，BR会越小，反之则反，因此衡量一个光纤的传输能力要用 BR 和长度的积。

课堂提问

工作原理，损耗

  1. 光纤是如何工作的？

    光纤是由内层和外层两层结构组成的，内层(core)折射率 $n_1$ 大于外层(cladding, 包层) $n_2$, 光在其中发生全内反射，被限制在内进行传播。

  2. 什么叫接收角？

    经过折射，在光纤中传播角小于临界传播角对应的入射角所夹的范围。

  3. 什么是数值孔径？物理意义是什么？

    数值孔径是接受角的一半的正弦值。数值孔径表征光纤端面接收光的能力。数值孔径对应的接收角范围内的光才能被光纤接收、在光纤中传播。

  4. 损耗分为几种？

    弯曲损耗、吸收损耗、散射损耗。

    吸收损耗包括材料的本征吸收和非纯吸收。

  5. 非纯吸收最主要的是 $OH^{-}$ 造成的吸收，由于此吸收的存在，主要通信窗口分成了三个，是哪三个？

    850 nm、1300 nm 、1550 nm

  6. 什么叫模式？

    只有特定的离散角度才能在波导中稳定传播，每一个离散的角度叫一个模式。

  7. 什么叫模式色散？

    不同模式的光在光纤中传播的光程不同导致相同时间内它们在光纤中传播到不同的位置，从而导致光脉冲的展宽，这种展宽叫做模式色散（模间色散）。

  8. 模式内部还有什么色散？

    模式内部的色散叫色度色散，是指由不同波长的光传播速度不同造成的脉冲展宽。

  9. 这些色散如何影响光信号在链路里的传输速率？

    色散造成脉冲展宽 $\Delta t$, 脉冲展宽影响带宽和比特率 $BW,BR$.

2 Single Mode Fiber

单模条件

$$
V<2.405
$$

模场直径

Manufacturers use the Mode-Field Diameter, MFD, (模场直径) ,rather than the core diameter as a parameter that describes single mode fibers. 麦克斯韦方程解出来是贝塞尔函数 $J(z)$, 为了方便用高斯函数去拟合：
$$
I(r)=I_0\exp(-\frac{2r^2}{w_0^2})
$$
光强为最大光强的 $e^{-2}$ 时对应的直径为模场直径：
$$
MFD=2w_0
$$

截止波长与有效截止波长

  • cutoff wavelength

    波长越小，V值越大，小到 $\lambda_c$ 不满足单模条件了，$\lambda_c$ 就是截止波长。

  • model noise

    截止波长附近 $LP_{11}$ 模式的功率非常高，对光纤的工作造成影响

  • effective cutoff wavelength

    The wavelength at which $LP_{11}$ experiences 19.3 dB more attenuation than the fundamental mode $LP_{01}$.

    • the effective cutoff wavelength of cabled fiber is shorter than that of uncabled fiber

Attenuation

  • Macrobending loss in SMF increases as operating wavelength increases and bend radius decreases

  • Microbending loss in SMF is also wavelength dependent. The reason is also the MFD’s increase with a longer $\lambda$, making more power radiate outside the core.

  • SMF has less absortion loss than multimode fiber, because the light goes through the SMF is less and thus less chance for absorption and scattering events to occur.

Dispersion

  • SMF does not have modal dispersion.

  • SMF中的色散按大类可分为色度色散和偏振模色散

  • Chromatic dispersion

    • Material dispersion

      Material dispersion is a delay-time dispersion caused by the fact that the refractive index of the glass material changes in accordance with the change of the signal frequency. 材料色散是由于材料的折射率随波长变化 $n=n(\lambda)$。

    • Waveguide dispersion

      The pulse spread because light is confined within a structure having different refractive indexes: after entering a single mode fiber, an information-carrying light pulse is distributed between the core and the cladding. (different speed when propagating between core and cladding) 波导色散是由于光在core和cladding中的传播速度不同。

  • Polarization-mode dispersion (PMD) 偏振模色散

    • Two orthogonal linear-polarized modes, $HE_{11}$ which we see as one $LP_{01}$ mode, travel along a singlemode fiber at different velocities because of the fiber’s birefringence. This results in the form of pulse spread called polarization-mode dispersion, PMD. Note that PMD does not depend on operation wavelength. 偏振膜色散来自两个偏振模式 $TE$ 和 $TM$ 在传播过程中感受到的折射率不同，分别为 $n_x,n_y$，复习一下物理光学的双折射部分

    • Beat length $l_p$ 拍长，描述PMD可以用拍长，就是两个偏振相位差达到 $2\pi$ 的距离（一个周期）

      Beat length is the length over which the phase difference between x- and y- polarized waves changes by $2\pi$:
      $$
      \beta=\frac{2\pi}{\lambda}(n_x-n_y)\implies l_p=\frac{2\pi}{\beta}=\frac{\lambda}{B.}
      $$

    • PMD与波长无关、与根号下光纤长度成正比
      $$
      \Delta t_{\text{PMD}}=D_{\text{PMD}}\sqrt{L}
      $$

  • Extinction Ratio (ER) 消光比
    $$
    ER(\text{dB})=-10\log \frac{P_\perp}{P_\parallel},
    $$
    where $P_\perp$ and $P_\parallel$ are light power in unexcited and excited modes, respectively. $P_\perp$ 是 $P_\parallel$ 耦合进入另一个偏振态的功率，会造成信号的衰减。

    • $h$ Parameter

$$
h(m^{-1}):=\frac{1}{L}\frac{P_\perp}{P_\parallel}\
$$

  • polarization cross talk (PCT)

$$
PCT(\text{dB}):=10\log\frac{P_\perp}{P_\parallel}=10\log hL.
$$

  • Management:

    • Dispersion-Compensating Fiber (DCF) 色散补偿光纤

      • To shift the minimum dispersion, designers can control mode-field distribution by changing the profiles of the core and cladding.改变折射率分布，造出来负色散常数的光纤

    • Dispersion-Compensating Gratings (DCG) 色散补偿光栅

      • Fiber Bragg gratings (FBG) 光纤布拉格光栅

        利用光栅的选频，把光栅不同长度的周期调得不一样（啁啾），可以选出不同频率，这样不同频率的光出射时的光程不一样，就达到了色散控制（补偿）的效果

    • DCF compensates over a wide range of wavelengths, while a FBG is more suitable for a very narrow band of wavelengths.

  • Polarization–Maintaining Fiber 保偏光纤

    • Hi-Bi 高双折射率 $B$

    • 大的 $B$ 可以限制偏振模式耦合到另一个偏振态，增大消光比

    • 大的 $B$ 使得拍长 $l_p$ 较小，光程差周期可控 (mm两级)，普通光纤的 $l_p$ 是 m 量级

Non-linear effect

  • 参量过程（能量在光之间转换）

    • Self-Phase Modulation (SPM)
      $$
      \Phi=\int_0^L(\beta-\beta’) \text dz=\int_0^L\gamma P(z)\text dz=\gamma P_{in}’L_{\text{eff}},\ P_{in}=n_2E^2
      $$

  • Cross-Phase Modulatoin (XPM)
    $$
    \Phi_1=\gamma L_{\text{eff}}(P_1+2P_2+2P_3),\quad \text{for a 3 channel transmission.}
    $$

    • Four-Wave Mixing (FWM)

  • 非参量过程: Stimulated Scatterning

    • Stimulated scattering is transferring energy from the incident wave to another, scattered wave at lower frequency (longer wavelength) with the small energy difference being realeased in the form of phonons.

    • The incident wave can be seen as a kind of pump wave. Scattered waves are called Stokes’ waves (斯托克斯光) .

    • Stimulated Raman Scattering (SRS)

      • SRS becomes an issue for WDM systems ( has wide SRS bandwidth $\sim$ THz so many channels can be coupled with)
      • SRS scattered light moves mostly forward and the phonons associated with this process are optical ones

    • Stimulated Brillouin Scattering (SBS)

      • SBS is a problem for a single-channel system (SBS bandwidth is very narrow)
      • SBS scattered light moves backward and the phonons associated with it are acoustic

课堂提问1

  1. 单模光纤是怎么实现的？

    减小V值到 <2.405 —> $V=\displaystyle\frac{\pi d}{\lambda} \text{NA}$ —> 增大工作波长、减小光纤直径、减小数值孔径

  2. 单模光纤中，一般不用芯层直径，而用什么？

    模场直径。为将光束的横向分布从贝塞尔分布近似为高斯分布后的两倍束腰半径/模场半径 $2w_0$.

  3. 光纤中的截止波长和有效截止波长分别是什么？

    截止波长是 $LP_{11}$ 模截止的波长，大于截止波长的光纤是单模光纤。

    有效截止波长的提出是从功率损耗的角度解决截止波长对附近的波长是否工作在单模模式界定不清的问题。有效截止波长是 $LP_{11}$ 模比 $LP_{01}$ 模损耗功率多 $19.3 \text{ dB}$ 时的光纤工作波长。不同种类、不同长度的光纤有效截止波长不一样。

  4. 弯曲损耗和波长之间是什么关系？

    波长影响V值，工作波长小V值大，能量限制在芯层的多，相同程度的弯曲下损耗小。波长越长，弯曲损耗越严重。

  5. 色散位移光纤、色散补偿光纤、色散平坦光纤等相同的设计思路是什么？

    调节总色散 —> 材料色散可以通过掺杂改变，但是变化范围小；可以入手的地方在于波导色散 —> 波导色散是光被约束在光纤中形成的，因此去改变光场在芯层包层中的能量分布 —> 这由V值/模场分布决定 —> 去改变折射率分布

课堂提问2

  1. 色散补偿有哪几种主要方式？

    使用色散补偿光纤或者色散补偿光栅。

  2. 色散补偿光纤是怎么设计的？考虑什么因素？

    一要提升色散常数，二要减小损耗。

  3. 偏振模色散是怎么产生的？

    基模$LP_{01}$由包括两个自然模式，这两个模式的偏振方向互相垂直，由于光纤不是理想的圆柱形，在光纤的两个垂直方向上传播的光由于双折射存在折射率差，因此传播速度不同，造成展宽。

  4. 偏振膜色散的特点？

    时间延迟与长度成根号关系，色散常数与频率（工作波长）没有相关性

  5. 自相位调制 (SPM) 的成因？

    简单地说是折射率的二阶非线性效应：
    $$
    n=n_0+n_2|E(\omega,t)|^2.
    $$
    进一步，由于光场振幅随着时间变化，折射率也与时间有关了，由此推出：
    $$
    E(\vec r,t)\sim e^{-i(\omega t-\beta z-\gamma P_0\varphi_{NL}\cdot L)}
    $$
    可得受到自身电场调制后的频率
    $$
    \omega’=\omega-\gamma\varphi_{NL}L\cdot\frac{d P_0}{dt}.
    $$
    于是光的频率与入射光功率有关，产生 啁啾 ，即不同时间的频率不同。

Question

  1. 为什么cabled fiber弯曲损耗更大？

  2. Depressed clading index profile 的作用和原理？

    增加折射率差来提高单模光纤的V值，提高抗弯能力。在光功率小到一定程度的半径处停止重掺杂减少材料消耗。

3 Fabrication and Connectorization

Fabrication

流程：制造预制棒和拉预制棒

  • preform production

  • drawing the preform

Cable

Fiber-optic cable is the protective enclosure surrounding a bare fiber.

Splicing

  • Splicing（接合）：splicing is the permanent connection of two pieces of optical fiber.
  • Methods: mechanical splicing and fusion splicing

Connection losses

  • Intrinsic loss:

    • 无法通过提升接合技术解决的损失
    • core-diameter mismatch
    • NA mismatch
    • MFD mismatch, formula of MFD loss is closer to reality

  • MFD loss: If two fibers have different mode-field diameters, one will have extra insertion loss
    $$
    Loss_ {\mathrm { MFD } } ( \mathrm { dB } ) = - 10 \log \left[ 4 / \left( \mathrm { MFD } _ { 1 } / \mathrm { MFD } _ { 2 } + \mathrm { MFD } _ { 2 } / \mathrm { MFD } _ { 1 } \right) ^ { 2 } \right]

    e.g. To decrease the splicing loss, the interim fiber is inserted between the conventional and the DCF fibers. (MFD of a regular SMF is 10.5mm; MFD of a DCF is 4.7 mm)

  • Extrinsic loss

    • 由接合时的瑕疵造成，理论上可消除
    • lateral misalignment
    • angular misalignment
    • end separation

  • Reflection loss

    -

    $$
    \begin{equation}

    R=\frac{P_{\text{refl}}}{P_\text{in}}&=\left(\frac{n_1-n_2}{n_1+n_2}\right)^2,\
    RL(\text{dB})&=-10\log R

Connectors (不考)

端面：PC、APC、UPC

为了让两根光纤的端面能够更好的接触，插芯端面通常被研磨成不同结构。PC、APC、UPC代表了陶瓷插芯的前端面结构。PC 是Physical Contact，物理接触。PC是微球面研磨抛光，插芯表面研磨成轻微球面，光纤纤芯位于弯曲最高点，这样两个光纤端面达到物理接触。APC (Angled Physical Contact) 称为斜面物理接触，光纤端面通常研磨成8°斜面。8°角斜面让光纤端面更紧密，并且将光通过其斜面角度反射到包层而不是直接返回到光源处， 提供了更好的连接性能。UPC (Ultra Physical Contact)，超物理端面。UPC是在PC的基础上更加优化了端面抛光和表面光洁度，端面看起来更加呈圆顶状。连接器连接需要以相同的端面结构，例如APC和UPC不能组合在一起，会导致连接器性能下降。

4 Transmitters

Light Emitting Diode

working principle

考虑一个原子核–电子的模型，电子处在分立的轨道，不同轨道的电子有着不同的能量。最外层电子（价电子）决定着材料的性质。把一块材料的所有原子中的电子按能量统计一下，就得到了一个电子的能量分布。有的轨道能量挨得很近，就把它们整合成能级。

半导体的导带和价带之间有个能级间隔 $E_g,$ 它决定着发射电磁波的频率/波长。有的半导体中价电子多，那么它的费米能级（0K时电子有无占据的分界线）就偏上，为 n型半导体；有的半导体空穴多，即留给电子来填的位置多，为 p型半导体（e.g. 在纯硅中掺入微量3价元素铟或铝，由于铟或铝原子周围有3个价电子，与周围4价硅原子组成共价结合时缺少一个电子，形成一个空穴）。

高能量的自由电子和空穴相遇时（可以想像成一个正离子和一个负离子相遇），就会发生“电子空穴对复合”，由于多出来的能量以光子形式辐射出来，这就是自发辐射 (radiative); 有的材料比如电二极管，多出来的能量以热的形式释放，为 non-radiative.

现在考虑一个P-N结，就是一块P型半导体和一块N型半导体物理接触，合在一起，接触部分形成的一段耗尽层(depletion region). 耗尽层的形成是由于N型半导体电子浓度大，往P型半导体漂移运动，一运动N型这边就多了空穴，达到稳定时形成一个边界，其电势能阻止着电子进一步扩散。

如果给这P型半导体一个正向偏压，就降低了耗尽层的势垒，可以把N型半导体的电子往P型拉，把P型半导体的空穴往N型拉，两者在depletion region复合，这样就有发光的机会了！

如上图，正向偏压使得电子和空穴在depletion region复合发光，然后电子（阴离子）往正极、空穴往负极（阳离子）走，在电源处电动势把它们搬过电源继续循环，就可以不断发光了。

LED导带上的电子是外电场做功激发的，LD也是，只是LD需要更多的导带电子（粒子数反转），这是通过高密度的电流(high–density forward current) 实现的。

homostructure and heterostructure

在同一个衬底上进行半导体n型和p型掺杂得到的PN结是同质结(homostructure),这种结不能有效限制电子和空穴复合的位置，因此发光的位置比较多，光的方向性不好、效率不高；于是人们发展了异质结。

异质结

  • 通过控制两边半导体的导带能量和价带能量使得电子和空穴仅能在中间的GaAs区域发生复合（可以移动到两边，但是无法复合？），从而限制发光区域
  • 通过中间和两边的折射率差限制发光的方向（类似光纤/波导）。(highly restricted active region and the conduction of radiated light in one direction)

surface and edge emitting LEDs

LED分为面发光 (SLED) 和边发光 (ELED), SLED 发出的光可以用朗伯光源建模，更适合耦合多模光纤，ELED则更适合耦合单模光纤。

  • coupling into a fiber

    当SLED发的光耦合进光纤时，进入的功率可按如下式子估算：
    $$
    P_{in}=P_0\cdot \text{NA}^2
    $$

properties

  • 光谱带宽一般大于 20nm, 这是由于电子导带和价带都是能带，电子从导带到价带降低到能量有些差别，造成光谱展宽

  • 调制带宽较小（MHZ级），电子空穴的复合发光所用时间较长（modulation bandwidth is limited by the recombination lifetime of the lifetime of the charge carriers)

  • power–bandwidth product
    $$
    BW\times P=\text{constant}
    $$
    其中 BW是 modulation bandwidth.

  • LED发出的光子是没有相关性的，光为非相干光

Laser Diode

working principle

LD发光原理是受激辐射，和激光的原理类似，LD发光需要三个条件

  • population inversion
    • 提供高电流密度电流 ($I>I_{th}$，active region厚度很小，0.1 $\mu$m量级，利用异质结等去限制 )
  • stimulated emission
    • 提供增益介质，LD中为PN结
  • positive feedbacck
    • 两边高折射率材料作为反射镜

发光过程：当电流超过阈值电流时，粒子数反转，自发辐射产生的光子与处于导带的电子相互作用产生受激辐射，不断反射增强。

structure of LDs

  • Fabry–Perot laser diodes

    两边加腔镜。满足驻波条件的光 $2L/\lambda=N$ 才能不断增强, 纵模间隔为
    $$
    \lambda_{N}-\lambda_{N+1}\approx\frac{2L}{N^2}=\frac{\lambda^2}{2L},
    $$
    由于产生的光通常是多纵模，其光谱带宽较大。如果 $\lambda$ 是真空中波长，那么 $L$ 是光学长度 $nl.$

  • Quantum Well laser diode

    To make lasing action more efficient, a special fabrication technique is used to form an especially thin active region, one on the order of 4 to 20 nm thickness. Such devices are called quantum–well (QW) laser diodes. 下图是量子阱和和多量子阱结构。

  • Distributed–feedback (DFB) laser diodes

    在PN结上刻蚀布拉格光栅，利用光栅结构做成了一个分布式的反射镜，只有满足布拉格条件 (Brag condition) 的光才能不停反射刺激产生受激辐射不断增强：
    $$
    2\Lambda n_{\text{eff}}=\lambda_B,
    $$
    其中 $\Lambda$ 为光栅周期， $n_{\text{eff}}$ 为有效折射率，$n_{\text{eff}}=n\sin\theta.$

  • Distributed–Bragg–reflector (DBR) laser diode

    两边放布拉格光栅，满足布拉格条件的光会不断反射增强。

    上图为DBR和DFB的对比图，(a) 为DBR LD，(c) 为DFB LD, (b) 是 (c) 的光栅结构示意。它们都用了多量子阱结构 (MQW) 限制了active region的厚度。

  • Vertical–cavity surface–emitting lasers (VCSEL)

    The words surface emitting mean that the laser’s beam is emitting perpendicular to the wafer.

    VCSEL的二极管体积小 (2 $\mu$m) ，因此纵模间隔很大，容易做到单纵模, 而且容易集成到芯片。(VCSELs therefore manifest a useful new twist in the marriage of optics and electronics.)

    QW LD提高方向性和效率，DBR、DFB、VCSEL易发展单纵模

properties

  • 外部光子使得受激辐射发出来的光和它的频率一致、相位一致、方向一致，因此带宽窄 (<1nm) 、光源为相干光、方向性好

  • 产生的光子都对出射光有贡献，发光效率高。 To make an LED radiate 1 mW of output power requires up to 150 mA of forward current; a laser diode can radiate 1 mW at 10 mA.

  • cooled and uncooled

    uncooled说明LD不需要冷却，发光效率高，热辐射小

  • rated output power $\text{P}_R$

    $\text{P}_R$ Is the maximum recommended power

  • Spectral shift

    Peak wavelength moves with temperature

  • Slope efficiency

    Differential (quantum) efficiency.
    $$
    S=\frac{\Delta P}{\Delta I}=\frac{P_{R}-P_{\text{th}}}{I_{\text{tot}}-I_{\text{th}}}.
    $$

  • Chirp （啁啾）

    啁啾是指发光波长与中心波长的偏离，当LD的电流改变时，会产生啁啾，这也是之后内调制LD不好使的原因之一。

three efficiencies

  • 功率效率 Power Efficiency

    输出光功率与使用的电功率之比。使用的电功率由发光消耗电子的功率和外部电路功率组成。
    $$
    \eta_p=\frac{P}{P_{\text{dc}}}=\frac{P}{I_F\times E_g/e+I_F^2R}
    $$

  • 外量子效率 External Quantum Efficiency

    外量子效率是出射光子数和注入电子数的比。
    $$
    \eta_{\text{ext}}=\frac{P\times t}{E_p}\bigg/\frac{I_F\times t}{e}=\frac{P}{I_F\times E_g/e},
    $$
    利用Slope efficiency计算：
    $$
    \begin{equation}
    \begin{split}
    \Delta P&=S\Delta I\
    \Delta P&=\eta_{\text{ext}}\times E_g/e\times \Delta I_F\
    \implies \eta_{\text{ext}}&=\frac{S}{E_g/e}
    \end{split}
    \end{equation}
    $$

  • 内量子效率 Internal Quantum Efficiency

    注入电子转化成光子的比例，这是由非辐射复合和辐射复合的速率决定的，设 $n$ 是单位体积的载流子数，则
    $$
    \begin{equation}
    \begin{split}
    v&=\frac{\text{d}n}{\text{d}t}=-\frac{n}{\tau},\
    \eta_{\text{int}}&=\frac{v_{r}\times T}{v_{tot}\times T}=\frac{\tau}{\tau_{r}}=1-\frac{\tau}{\tau_{nr}}.

    \end{split}
    \end{equation}
    $$

  • 腔量子效率

    这个是由内外量子效率定义的，表示出射的光子与产生的光子的比例：
    $$
    \eta_{\text{ext}}=\eta_{\text{int}}\cdot \eta_{\text{cav}}
    $$
    腔量子效率可以用损耗来计算。总损耗是由出射损耗和active region的吸收损耗构成，对于腔来说，出射损耗乘总光子数就是出射光子数，而吸收损耗则为产生的光子数:
    $$
    \begin{equation}
    \begin{split}
    I&=I_0R_1R_2e^{-\alpha_{mat}2d}=I_0e^{-\alpha 2d}\
    \implies \alpha&=\alpha_{mat}+\alpha_{tr},\ \alpha_{tr}=\frac{1}{2d}\ln\frac{1}{R_1R_2},\
    \eta_{\text{cav}}&=\frac{\alpha_{tr}}{\alpha}.
    \end{split}
    \end{equation}
    $$

Transmitter Module

Internal modulation

Laser driver 给LD提供电流驱动（将电压源转换成电流源），另外提供偏置电流以加速调制过程。

由于LD对电流改变的响应时间较慢（laser diode’s relaxation frequency，内调制LD的带宽受到限制；而且内调制存在啁啾问题，导致难以用到WDM系统中，因此人们转向发展外调制LD。

External modulation

外调制用CW激光器，分为 Mach–Zehnder (MDM) 和 Electroabsorption (EA) 电吸收调制器两种。

MDM利用电压对折射率的改变，一个臂加调制信号对应的电压，低电压正常出光，高电压产生90度相移干涉相消。MDM有两个坏：一是驱动电压较大（10V左右），一是有一个干涉仪外部附件，插入损耗大。

电吸收调制器直接造在LD的材料上，把电压调制加在出光后的半导体波导上，利用波导的 Franz–Keldysh effect（When modulation voltage is applied, a bandgap, $E_g$ of the waveguide material decreases)，加电压后带隙降低，于是可以吸收光子，吸收了光子光强就降低了。

5 Receivers

Photodiode

Principle

PN结depletion region中复合好的电子空穴对接收光子的能量分开，形成光电流。或者说光子的能量使得被束缚在原子核附近的电子跳出来成为自由电子。

  • 光电压模式 photovoltaic

    不加额外电压，比如solar panels.

  • 光电导模式 photoconductive

    加反向偏压（使得depletion region变厚, $w\sim \sqrt{V}$ ）。

    有许多好处：

    • 提高响应速度。As soon as the incident photon creates eletron–hole pairs, this voltage helps to seperate these free charge carriers and quickly removes them from the depletion region.
    • 由于depletion region电阻高，反向偏压都加在这里，可以有效减小暗电流（及时把由热能激发的自由电子搬走）
      • 注意：实际情况应该是暗电流随反向偏压增大而增加（见2020年考题），这是由于电压增加有利于器件本身的少数载流子（P中的电子，N中的空穴）漂移 ——by whw
    • 使电子空穴对的分离都集中在depletion region中（提高产生光电流的电流密度？solar panel不用是因为它需要大面积接收光子？而且是用于产生电能的）。光子打到n区或者p区时，在p区或者n区由于电压低，电子空穴对无法被有效分离。
    • 减小重新复合（recombination），提高光电流产生效率。The reverse voltage sweeps them from the depletion region faster than they can recombine again.

Responsivity

响应度描述光子–光电流的对应关系：
$$
I_p=RP.
$$

We usually evaluate any communications device by looking for its response to the amplitude and the frequency of the input signal. The first parameter (the device’s response to amplitude) describes the power input–output relationship, while the second (the response to the frequency of the signal) tells us about the device’s bandwidth.

响应度是与波长有关的：

  • 随着波长的增加，响应度线性上升，这是由于单个光子的能量降低，相同功率中携带的光子数多了，激发的电子也就多
  • 但是波长大到一定程度，$E_p<E_g$ 的时候，就无法激发电子了，这时候就出现长波截止
  • 波长小到一定程度，能量过大，用力过猛，可能把电子激发到原子内层（猜测），电子就不是自由电子了，那么这样也会出现短波截止

量化一下线性关系：
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
I_p&=\frac{N_e\cdot e}{t},\ P=\frac{N_p\cdot E_p}{t}=\frac{N_p\cdot hc/\lambda}{t}\
\implies& R=\frac{I_p}{P}=\frac{N_e\cdot e}{N_p\cdot hc}\lambda\
\implies& R(\text{A/W})=\frac{\eta}{1248}\lambda(\text{nm}),\ \eta=\frac{N_e}{N_p}.
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$
用指数吸收模型去进一步建模量子效率 $\eta$ 。假设PD的吸收系数为 $\alpha_{\text{abs}},$ active/depletion region的厚度为 $w$, 则每一个吸收的光子产生一个电子，有
$$
P_{\text{abs}}=P_{\text{in}}(1-e^{-\alpha_{\text{abs}}w}),
$$
量子效率为吸收的光功率除以进入的光功率：
$$
\eta=\frac{P_{\text{abs}}}{P_{\text{in}}}=1-e^{-\alpha_{\text{abs}}w}.
$$

Bandwidth

Bandwidth can be defined as the maximum frequency, or bit rate, that a photodiode can detect without making essential errors.

PD的带宽是它在一定误差内可以探测的光信号的最大频率，超过这个频率电信号还没产生，新的光子又打了过来，造成探测误差。这样分析过来，带宽由两部分决定：

  • 光子入射到电子产生的时间。由active region的厚度决定：
    $$
    \tau_{\text{tr}}=\frac{w}{v_\text{sat}},
    $$
    其中 $v_{\text{sat}}$ 是载流子在depletion region的最大移动速度。

  • 电子产生到PD响应的时间（充电时间）。由PD的结电容和负载电阻决定：
    $$
    \tau_{\text{RC}}=(R_s+R_L)C_{\text{in}}\approx R_L C_{\text{in}}=R_L\frac{\epsilon A}{w}.
    $$

带宽为：
$$
\text{BW}{\text{PD}}=\frac{1}{2\pi(\tau{\text{tr}}+\tau_{\text{RC}})}.
$$
可见depleting region有一个最佳厚度，然后降低负载电阻和depletion region的面积 $A$, 但是这里有一个 trade–off，降低负载电阻会导致噪声增大。

p–i–n Photodiodes

The major feature of this photodiode is that it consists of a thick, lightly doped intrinsic layer sandwiched between thin p and n regions.

PIN PD有两个好处：

  • depletion region厚，量子效率高
  • depletion region的厚度可以有中间的本征半导体控制，而不是像PN PD要通过加反向电压来增大，可以减小驱动电压

上图是前向照明和后向照明 (rear–illuminated) 的pin PD，后向照明的重掺杂的 $n^+$ 层载流子多，可能是作为半导体层和金属层的过渡层，传输电子。

Avalanche Photodiodes

A special p-i-n structure of a photodiode is used. Incident photons generate primary electrons and holes, as they do in a regular p-i-n PD. Relatively high (around 20 V) reverse voltage is applied to the photodiode. This voltage accelerates photogenerated electrons and holes, which thereupon acquire high energy. These electrons and holes strike neutral atoms and separate other bonded electrons and holes. These secondary carriers gain enough energy to ionize other carriers, causing a so–called avalanche process of creating new carriers.

光子经过 $p^+$层到本征半导体层，激发出电子空穴对。反向电压把它们分离，把电子（阴离子？）移动到 $pn^+$结，在结区很高的电场（why？）加速阴离子的运动造成雪崩效应 (impact ionization)，这样一个光子产生 $M$ 个电子。

APD的响应度为:
$$
R_{\text{APD}}=MR_{\text{p-i-n}}=\frac{M\eta}{1248}\lambda
$$
要注意雪崩是需要时间的，因此有增益和带宽的trade–off：
$$
M\times \text{BW}=\frac{1}{2\pi\tau_e}
$$
另外APD有高增益、低噪声，但缺点是需要高反向电压。

Noise in PD

总的噪声为
$$
i_{\text{noise}}=\sqrt{i_{s}^2+i_t^2+i_d^2+i_{1/f}^2},
$$
是散粒噪声、热噪声、暗电流噪声、1/f噪声的均方根。

Shot noise 散粒噪声

散粒噪声来自于平均光生电子数的涨落。
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
S_s(f)&=2eI_p^\
i_s&=\sqrt{S_s(f)\text{BW}_{\text{PD}}}=\sqrt{2eI_p^\text{BW}{\text{PD}}}\
i{sN}(A/\sqrt{Hz})&=i_s/\sqrt{\text{BW}{\text{PD}}}=\sqrt{2eI_p^*}.
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$
其中 $I_p^*$ 是平均光电流，$i{sN}$ 为标准带宽散粒噪声电流。

对 p-i-n PD，散粒噪声相比热噪声可忽略，但是对APD，散粒噪声被放大M倍，而热噪声没有被放大，因此不能忽略散粒噪声。

Thermal noise

温度变化引起的电子移动产生的电流为热噪声。它的值较大，在 p-i-n和APD中都是主要部分。
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
S_t(f)&=\frac{2k_BT}{R_L}\
i_t&=\sqrt{\frac{4k_BT}{R_L}\text{BW}_{\text{PD}}}\

\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$
从表达式中可以看到，增大负载 $R_L$ 可以有效减小热噪声，原因应该是负载电阻增加后PD上的电压降减小了。（但是会降低响应时间 $\tau_{RC}$）

Dark–current noise

暗电流噪声是暗电流的均方根。
$$
i_d=\sqrt{2eI_d^*\text{BW}_{\text{PD}}}
$$

1/f noise

把频率相关的噪声都归到了这一类，可用经验公式拟合，一般频率高于 100Hz 就可以忽略。

Signal–to–Noise Ratio

$$
\text{SNR}=\frac{\text{signal power}}{\text{noise power}}=\frac{I_p^{*2}R_L}{i_{\text{noise}}^2R_L}=\frac{R^2P^{*2}}{i_{\text{noise}}^2}
$$

Noise–equivalent power

噪声等价功率。
$$
\text{NEP(W)}=\frac{i_{\text{noise}}}{R}
$$

Sensitivity

Q value

考虑 Bit Error Rate：
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\text{BER}&=0.5\left[P(1/0)+P(0/1)\right]\
&=0.5\times\left[0.5\operatorname{erfc\left(\frac{I_1-I_{\text{th}}}{i_1\sqrt{2}}\right)}+0.5\operatorname{erfc\left(\frac{I_{\text{th}}-I_0}{i_0\sqrt{2}}\right)}\right].
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$
当BER最大时，有
$$
Q:=\frac{I_1-I_{\text{th}}}{i_1}=\frac{I_{\text{th}}-I_0}{i_0},
$$
此时阈值电流应为
$$
I_{\text{thopt}}=\frac{I_1i_0+I_0i_1}{i_1+i_0},
$$
“数字信噪比” Q值为
$$
Q=\frac{I_1-I_0}{i_1+i_0}.
$$
这就是Q值当来源，最小BER可以用Q值来表示：
$$
\text{BER}{\min}=\frac{1}{2}\operatorname{erfc}(\frac{Q}{\sqrt{2}}).
$$
因此一个通信系统，对它的BER做要求，可以转化为对Q值做要求，接下来可以进一步转化为对其PD的灵敏度 (最小接收光功率 $P{\min}$) 做要求。

Minimum optical power

Minimum received power is the average optical power received in both bit 1 and bit 0:
$$
P_\min=\frac{P_1+P_0}{2}.
$$
不妨设 $P_0=0,$ 则 $I_1=RP_1=2RP_\min$, 带入到Q值的表达式，就可以得到 $Q$ 与 $P_\min$ 的关系。

Coupler

Coupler 是对单波长的光进行分束或者合束。

Lossless coupling is impossible.

fused biconical taper (FBT) coupler

把耦合区域的光纤拉细，这样V值增加，MFD增加，就可以耦合到第二个光纤中。

出光情况为(?)：
$$

\begin{split}
P_1&=P_{in}\cos^2[k(\lambda)z]\
P_2&=P_{in}\sin^2[k(\lambda)z].
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$

Mach–Zehnder interferometer (MZI) coupler

注意根据耦合波理论，由上边的光纤耦合进入下边或者反之，会经历一个 $\pi/2$ 的相移。

如果 $\Delta L=0,$ 则光会从4出来：

控制 $\Delta L$ 可以改变出光比例
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
P_4&=P_{in}\cos^2[k(\lambda)z]\
P_3&=P_{in}\sin^2[k(\lambda)z].
\end{split}
\end{equation}

Wavelength–Division Multiplexer

WDM和Coupler的区别在于WDM是入射光是多波长的，WDM把每个波长分到不同的出口，而Coupler是把单色光的不同光强分到不同出口。

实例如上图的阵列波导光栅(AWG)。AWG分光是利用干涉，入射AWG的光经过WDM coupler，均匀分发到AW传输，光到达不同出口经历的相移不一样，只有某一波长的光在此干涉增强。

ATOF是个很有意思的器件，它基于布拉格衍射，由声波产生的光栅确定了一个 $\lambda_m$, 传输过程中仅此波长会发生TE/TM的转换。利用偏振分束器和耦合器把 $\lambda_m$ 的光从许多波长中滤出来。

Isolator / Circulator

一些题

  1. WDM is the leading technology in today’s communication network.

    (1) Why do we use WDM systems?

    ​ To improve the system bandwidth.

    (2) Please list three kinds of (de)multiplexers for WDM systems, also describe the basic working principle and advantages/disadvantage for these (de)multiplexers.

    • Arrayed–waveguide–grating WDMs (AWG).
    • Diffraction–grating WDMs.
    • Fiber Bragg grating (FBG) WDMs.
    • Dielectric multicavity thin–film filter (DMTF) WDMs.

    Advantages/disadvantages: ?

  2. The E–O efficiency of laser diode goes down with the operation temperature, explain the cause responsible for this observation.

    (1) Threshold current changes with the temperature (much more sensitive than slope efficiency). When temperature goes up, $I_{th}$ also increases, therefore the same output power would require more current, which results in a decrease in efficiency.

    (2) The peak withlength $\lambda_p$ moves with the temperature. When temperature increases, the wavelength would not at peak, hence requiring more current to level up the power. This would result an efficiency decrease.

    (3) Slope efficiency $S$ changes with the temperature. $S$ decreases with the temperature increases, hence the same amount of power would require more current input, which reduces the E–O efficiency.

    (4) Thermal noise and dark noise increases with the temperature.

3 Fout-Wave Mixing 四波混频

Basics

When three waves at frequencies $f_i,f_j,f_k$ traverse a fiber, they generate another signal located at $f=f_i+f_j-f_k.$

In general, the number of newly generated signals is given by
$$
M=2C_N^2+3C_N^3=\frac{N^2(N-1)}{2}.
$$
FWM is a third order nonlinearity. Assume the interacted plane waves are
$$
\mathbf{E}_q=E(\omega_q)\exp\left({-j\mathbf{k_q}\cdot\mathbf{r}}\right),
$$
the posible generated wavelength should satisfy energy conservation and momentum conservation (phase matching):
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\omega_1+\omega_2&=\omega_3+\omega_4,\
\mathbf{k}_1+\mathbf{k}_2&=\mathbf{k}_3+\mathbf{k}_4.
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$

When phase mismatches, $\Delta k=k_1+k_2-k_3$ determines the FWM efficiency $\eta_F$,
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\Delta k\ll 0&\implies \eta_F\to 1,\
\Delta k \gg 1 &\implies \eta_F\to 0.
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$

Reducing FWM

FWM will cause power depletion on DWDM system. Possible solutions are:

  • Polarization allocation

  • Unequal spacing

  • Dispersion management

    • Eliminate zero-dispersion point
    • But make total dispersion near zero

为什么色散管理可以减小FWM？Four wave mixing (FWM) need a certain well controlled amount of dis persion, i.e. resudial dispersion? 为什么要给零色散波长处的色散留一个残差？

考虑四波混频 (FWM) 的理论推导：
$$
\frac { d A _ { 4 } } { d z } = i \gamma _ { 4 } \left( 2 \left| A _ { 1 } \right| ^ { 2 } A _ { 4 } + 2 \left| A _ { 2 } \right| ^ { 2 } A _ { 4 } + 2 \left| A _ { 3 } \right| ^ { 2 } A _ { 4 } + \left| A _ { 4 } \right| ^ { 2 } A _ { 4 } + 2 A _ { 1 } A _ { 2 } A _ { 3 } ^ { * } e ^ { - i \Delta \beta z } \right)
$$
可以看到，当 $\Delta \beta=\beta_3+\beta_4-\beta_1-\beta_2$ 很小时，FWM效应很大，后面的推导可以证明 $\Delta\beta$ 就是色散常数 $D(\lambda).$ 将 $\beta$ 在 $\omega_0$ (零色散频率) 处展开：
$$
\beta ( \omega ) = \beta _ { 0 } \left( \omega _ { 0 } \right) + \frac{d\beta}{d\omega}\bigg|{\omega_0}\left( \omega - \omega _ { 0 } \right) + \frac { 1 } { 2 } \frac{d^2\beta}{d\omega^2}\bigg|{\omega _ { 0 }} \left( \omega - \omega _ { 0 } \right) ^ { 2 } + \cdots
$$
则 :
$$
\begin{aligned}
\Delta \beta&=\beta_3+\beta_4-\beta_1-\beta_2\
&=(\omega_3+\omega_4-\omega_1-\omega_2)+\frac{1}{2}D(\omega_0)(\omega-\omega_0)^2\
&=\frac{1}{2}D(\omega_0)(\omega-\omega_0)^2,

\end{aligned}
$$
其中 $\omega_3+\omega_4-\omega_1-\omega_2=0$ 是由于能量守恒。

  • Increasing effective area of fiber
    • FWM and other effect most likely to take place at locations of high power density . One way to reduce FWM is using a large effective area fiber since large effective area fibers spread the power density more evenly across the fiber core —> peak power reduced and thus FWM

4 EDFA

Descriptions

  • Invented at Stanford in early 1980s by H. J. Shaw and Michel

    Digonnet

  • Works best in the range from 1530 to 1565 nm

  • Gains of 30–40 dB possible

  • Within a length of doped fiber part of the pump energy is transferred to the

    input signal by stimulated emission

  • Pump wavelength is either 980 nm or 1480 nm, pump power ~ 50 mW (LD power between 10 and 200 mW)

  • Spontaneous emission occurs randomly at time constant $\sim 1\ \text{ms}$

  • Fiber length is typically $10\ \text{m}$

Pumping wavelengtsh

  • 980 nm: low noise, narrow absorption band, for low noise performance requirement

  • 1480 nm: hight efficiency, broader absorption cross-section , for higher power amplifiers

Emission property

  • $1.52–1.57 \ \mu\text{m}$
  • Long living upper state (10 ms)
  • Gain $\sim 30\ \text{dB}$
  • High output power, >200 mW
  • EDFA is in saturation if almost all Erbium ions are consumed for amplification

Noise

  • Noise figure in an ideal DFA is 3 dB (physical limit)

    • Noise figure is defined as
      $$
      \begin{equation}
      F=\frac{\text{SNR}\text{i}}{\text{SNR}\text{o}}=\frac{P{\text{ASE}}}{h\nu \cdot G\cdot \text{BW}{OSA}}
      \end{equation}
      $$

  • Practical amplifiers can have noise figure as large as 6–8 dB

  • The principal source of noise in DFAs is Amplified Spontaneous Emission (ASE), which has

    a spectrum approximately the same as the gain spectrum of the amplifier.

    • Spontaneous emission (SE) is not polarized or coherent

    • SE wavelength: 1520–1570 nm

    • Input signal(s) consume metastable (亚稳态) electrons —> much less ASE

      注：电子会在激发态上待100纳秒左右，但是在亚稳态上，会停留大概10毫秒左右，这些在亚稳态上的电子应该是会贡献自发辐射，它们被用于产生受激辐射后，ASE显然会降低。

5 Raman

如果一个弱信号光与一个强泵浦光同时在一根光纤中传输，并且弱信号光的波长在强泵浦光的拉曼增益带宽内（约70~100nm），则强泵浦光的能量通过受激拉曼散射SRS耦合到光纤硅材料的振荡模中，然后又以较长的波长发射，该波长就是信号光的波长，从而使弱信号光得到放大，获得拉曼增益。

RFA是分布式放大器，EDFA是掺铒光纤作为增益介质的集中式放大器。

entry.title: Compressive Sensing Notes
entry.content:
学习压缩感知理论的笔记，参考书为 A Mathematical Introduction to Compressive Sensing, Simon Foucart, Holger Rauhut 及相关论文。

Lasso Regression with Soft Thresholding

Problem: regression with regularization
$$
\min_\mathbf{x} |\mathbf{y}-\mathbf{Wx}|_2^2+\lambda|\mathbf{W}|_1,
$$
where $\mathbf{W}$ is weight vector.

Solution: Do derivative to the cost function, and use soft thresholding function $\text{soft}(\lambda,\mathbf{W})$ as the subderivative to replace the derivate of non-differentiable absolute function.

Reference: soft thresholding with lasso regression

Iterative Shrinkage/Thresholding (IST)

Problem:
$$
\min_{\mathbf x} \frac{1}{2}|\mathbf{y-Kx}|^2+\lambda\Phi(\mathbf{x})
$$
Consider $\Phi=|\cdot|_1$ .

Solution:
$$
\mathbf{x}_{t+1}=(1-\beta)\mathbf{x}_t+\beta\Psi_\lambda\left(\mathbf{x}_t+\mathbf{K}^T(\mathbf{y-Kx}_t)\right),
$$
where $\Psi_\lambda(x)$ is soft thresholding function:
$$
\Psi_\lambda(x)=\begin{cases}x+T,& x\le-\lambda,\ 0,&|x|<\lambda,\x-T,&x\ge\lambda.\end{cases}
$$

For the optimization problem
$$
\min _\mathbf{x} |\mathbf{y}-A\mathbf{x}|^2+\eta |\mathbf{h}-\mathbf{x}|^2,
$$
a direct solution is given in the closed form as
$$
\mathbf{x}=(A^TA+\eta I)^{-1}(A^T\mathbf{y}+\eta \mathbf{h}).
$$
